name: EthanO [Demo]
description:
Your town has been attacked by cute, deadly viruses. You, EthanO, the last soldier of the Ethanol Squad, must save the town by killing them all. 

EthanO (pronounced Ethanol) is a 2D pixel art platformer game about killing viruses. Run around, shoot viruses with grenades and missiles while keeping your health up by wearing masks and using excessive amount of hand sanitizer. 

Featuring:

  • little yellow guy
  • big bouncy yellow guy
  • cute enemies I didn't name
  • too many missiles
  • a cute fox that does more damage and has more animations than the main character

Controls

Jump: Spacebar/W/up key

Move: WASD/Arrow keys; (S/down key for jumping down platforms and fast falling)

Shoot: C/Enter

Future Plans:

  • New friendly characters
  • New enemies
  • New weapons

Credits:

Pun Tichachol - Programming and Art

Bonnie Lee - Art

Antti Luode - Background Music
